bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Most likely a misspelling of yue ji 噦疾 , retching ailment, in Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Bai bing zhu zhi yao 百病主治藥：鹿角，食後喜嘔，燒研，同人參末，薑湯服。小 兒噦痰，同大豆末塗乳飲之 , “Deer horn: [To treat] a tendency to vomit after having had a meal. Roast and grind, ingest together with ren shen powder and a decoction with jiang . For children with phlegm retching , smear it on the [mother’s] breast nipple together with da dou powder, and [have the child ingest] it when drinking”. In Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry lu 鹿 , quoting Gu jin lu yan Recipe book. Tang era, ca. 7th century. 古今錄驗 , the same recipe is given for the indication “children with retching ailment”: 小兒噦疾：鹿角粉、大豆末 等分，相和乳調，塗乳上飲之 , “For children with retching ailment: mix equal amounts of deer horn powder and da dou powder with breast milk, smear on [the mother’s] breast nipple and [have the child ingest] it when drinking”.
